export-entities.name: Unit Test/Policy Lvl1
export-entities.pql: ID 511 STATUS EMPTY CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES POLICY "Unit Test/Policy Lvl1" ATTRIBUTE USAGE FOR (TRUE AND (FALSE OR TRUE)) ON (TRUE AND (GROUP="Action/Coopy" OR GROUP="Action/delette")) TO (TRUE AND TRUE) BY ((TRUE AND (FALSE OR GROUP="User/Robert")) AND (TRUE AND (FALSE OR GROUP="Host/Computer Bs")) AND (TRUE AND TRUE)) DO deny BY DEFAULT DO allow ON deny DO log

export-entities.name: User/Robert
export-entities.pql:
ID 516 STATUS EMPTY CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "User/Robert" = DESCRIPTION "Robert Lin" (((FALSE OR user.did = 124) AND TRUE) AND (TRUE AND TRUE))

export-entities.name: Host/Computer Bs
export-entities.pql:
ID 522 STATUS EMPTY CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "Host/Computer Bs" = (((host.ldapgroupid = 553 OR host.ldapgroupid = 106 OR host.ldapgroupid = 140) AND TRUE) AND (TRUE AND TRUE))

export-entities.name: Action/Coopy
export-entities.pql:
ID 527 STATUS EMPTY CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "Action/Coopy" = (FALSE OR COPY)

export-entities.name: Action/delette
export-entities.pql:
ID 530 STATUS EMPTY CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "Action/delette" = (FALSE OR DELETE)
